title: Donnie Brasco
writer: Joseph D. Pistone, Richard Woodley, Paul Attanasio
actors: Al Pacino, Johnny Depp, Michael Madsen
plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 2 wins & 16 nominations total
